column4: there is a gui thing that lets you use ndiswrapper windows drivers
kind of its almost ubuntu with a couple of packages and different artwork
but it seems to be moving
but i think feisty is including another gui for wireless setups, there is a problem with people roaming from manual config to dhcp enviroments..
it seems to follow the pattern just fine
ganguro girl? oh that doesnt count ;)
hehe no no, that was a japanese fashion of darkening the skin and using yellow hair ^^
that describes my wifes last trip to the beauty saloon
im so used to *bsd and users in wheel are the only ones permitted to do su
heh heh :)  i never understood where the name 'wheel' came from
sounded like the wheel in a car or ship?
im suprised they dident use the 'root' group. :) we need the word root used more often!
